bibl.title: Early Cnidian Amphora Exports to Alexandria, Egypt.
bibl.note: Presents the exportation of Cnidian wine in early Cnidian amphorae to Alexandria after the foundation of the city in c. 332 BC., through the stamped handles found in the rescue excavations of Centre d'études alexandrines (CEAlex) in the city. - Avec résumé en anglais et en turc.

bibl.title: "Ahmet Kaan Şenol & Gülseren Kan Şahin, Recent Studies on the Archaeology of Anatolia"

bibl.seg: Gonca Cankardeş-Şenol, Early Cnidian Amphora Exports to Alexandria, Egypt.

Ergün Laflı & Sami Patacı (edd.), with the assistance of Gonca Cankardeş-Şenol, Ahmet Kaan Şenol & Gülseren Kan Şahin, Recent Studies on the Archaeology of Anatolia = BAR International Series. 2750 (Oxford, 2015) pp. 169-192, 4 diagrammes, 51 figg., 1 carte.

Presents the exportation of Cnidian wine in early Cnidian amphorae to Alexandria after the foundation of the city in c. 332 BC., through the stamped handles found in the rescue excavations of Centre d'études alexandrines (CEAlex) in the city. - Avec résumé en anglais et en turc.
